dict.acceptation: 忙碌的；占线；繁华的；爱管闲事的；
忙着做某事；使奔走；使经营；

sent.orig: E_busy: (10400) Signifies that the request cannot be processed at the current time.
sent.trans: E_busy: (10400) 表示当前无法处理该请求。

sent.orig: The IF1 Registers are locked while the Busy bit is set.
sent.trans: 当Busy位置位时IF1寄存器锁定。

sent.orig: The Busy bit indicates that the transmission is pending.
Brookie: I don't know! They always busy! Busy busy busy!
sent.trans: 我不知道。他们整天除了忙还是忙、忙、忙！

sent.orig: B Oh, busy, busy. I had a very busy weekend.
sent.trans: B噢，忙，忙。我度过了一个忙碌的周末。
